did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.physdesc: This collection consists of 5 photographs: black & white; 20.5cm. x 25.5cm. & smaller.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
Univeristy of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Photographs by Katherine Kayser, Accession #10190-a, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was purchased from the photographer, Charlottesville, Va. on 1986 July 17.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of photographs taken at the opening reception of the U.Va. library exhibition "Treasures of learning" in honor of Clifton Waller Barrett. Subjects include Barrett and Mrs. Barrett with the Barrett Literary Manuscript Project Volunteers, and Barrett with President and Mrs. Robert O'Neil.

did.unittitle: Photographs of Clifton Waller Barrett 1986 April 27
did.physdesc: Black and White Photo, two 3 1/2" x 5"
